Trial_Design.evidence: A mixed-methods study design was adopted.

Participants.evidence: Twelve vascular surgery residents from Ireland were tasked with completing two endovascular renal artery procedures.

Intervention.evidence: one with in-person expert feedback and the other with remote instruction.

Objective.evidence: This study aims to explore the effectiveness of remote expert instructional feedback of endovascular simulation-based education.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Twelve vascular surgery residents from Ireland were tasked with completing two endovascular renal artery procedures.

Result_Outcome.evidence: There was no significant difference reported by participants using a post-event validated questionnaire between remote and in-person feedback.
